description: Details of condition 19(Ecological Enhancement) pursuant to the planning permission 16/01287/OUTM for the Outline application for demolition of existing buildings and hard standing, residential development of up to 329 units and up to 1,050 sq metres of commercial floorspace (with flexible uses across classes A1 - A4 (retail, financial and professional services, caf√© and restaurants) and B1a (office) and D1 (community uses) and D2 (Boat Club),  with all matters reserved, and associated works including, informal and formal open space, internal road network; landscaping; car and cycle parking; waste storage
